item.title: ‘The card served its purpose’: It’s time to cancel our Chase Disney Visa credit card. What’s our next card for middle age?
item.description: “We’d like to move on to another credit card for the benefits.”

item.title: Strategy’s stock shows why it’s a trade, and not an investment
item.description: Strategy’s stock is sinking as bitcoin falls, but Wall Street doesn’t believe it’s a big problem for the broader stock market.

item.title: Gold, silver and copper are reaching record highs together for the first time in 45 years. Here’s why more gains could follow.
item.description: Some factors driving metals prices higher in 2025 are similar to those back in 1980, strategists say. But a few important differences could offer clue...

item.title: Gold at $10,000, a quantum-driven crypto collapse and costly AI scandals are among these ‘outrageous’ bets for 2026.
item.description: Saxo Bank is at it again with outrageous predictions for 2026.

item.title: My friend cosigned a loan for a BMW, but the driver defaulted. They’re both on the hook for $5K. What happens now?
item.description: “The driver thinks he should be compensated $1,500 for the tires he’s still paying for.”
